languages.text: {n}Спустившиеся со склона местные обитатели вблизи выглядят крайне недружелюбно. У самого мерзкого отсутствует один глаз: оставшимся он пристально следит за вами.{/n}
{n}The local inhabitants coming down the slope look hostile in the extreme. The vilest of them is missing an eye, but he makes sure to keep his remaining one fixed on you.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Спустившиеся со склона местные обитатели вблизи выглядят крайне недружелюбно. У самого мерзкого отсутствует один глаз: оставшимся он пристально следит за вами.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The local inhabitants coming down the slope look hostile in the extreme. The vilest of them is missing an eye, but he makes sure to keep his remaining one fixed on you.{/n}
{n}The suspicious individuals by the ladder look even less savoury up close. The vilest of them is missing an eye; still, he makes sure not to let you out of his sight.{/n}
{n}The local inhabitants coming down the slope look hostile in the extreme. The vilest of them is missing an eye, but he makes sure to keep his remaining one fixed on you.{/n}
{n}The suspicious individuals by the ladder look even more unsavoury up close. The vilest of them is missing an eye; nevertheless, he makes sure not to let you out of his sight.{/n}
{n}The local inhabitants coming down the slope look hostile in the extreme. The vilest of them is missing an eye, but he makes sure to keep his remaining one fixed on you.{/n}
{n}The local inhabitants coming down the slope look hostile in the extreme. The vilest of them is missing an eye, but he makes sure to keep his remaining one fixed on you.{/n}
{n}The local inhabitants coming down the slope look hostile in the extreme. The vilest of them is missing an eye, but he makes sure to keep his remaining one fixed on you.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这群从山坡上跑下来的当地居民看起来充满敌意。相貌最凶狠的那个家伙缺了一只眼睛，但他的独眼片刻都没有离开过你。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The local inhabitants coming down the slope look hostile in the extreme. The vilest of them is missing an eye, but he makes sure to keep his remaining one fixed on you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这群从山坡上跑下来的当地居民看起来充满敌意。相貌最凶狠的那个家伙缺了一只眼睛，但他的独眼片刻都没有离开过你。{/n}

languages.text: {n}坂を下りてくる地元の住民たちは、極めて敵意に満ちた様子だ。一番悪そうな奴は片目がなかったが、残ったもう片方の目であなたをじっと見据えていた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The local inhabitants coming down the slope look hostile in the extreme. The vilest of them is missing an eye, but he makes sure to keep his remaining one fixed on you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}坂を下りてくる地元の住民たちは、極めて敵意に満ちた様子だ。一番悪そうな奴は片目がなかったが、残ったもう片方の目であなたをじっと見据えていた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los lugareños descienden por la pendiente con cara de pocos amigos. Al más malencarado le falta un ojo, pero procura no quitarte el otro de encima.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The local inhabitants coming down the slope look hostile in the extreme. The vilest of them is missing an eye, but he makes sure to keep his remaining one fixed on you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Los lugareños descienden por la pendiente con cara de pocos amigos. Al más malencarado le falta un ojo, pero procura no quitarte el otro de encima.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Yamaçtan inen yerliler, son derece düşmancıl görünüyor. En iğrenç olanlarının bir gözü eksik ancak kalan gözünü senden ayırmamak için ciddi bir özen gösteriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The local inhabitants coming down the slope look hostile in the extreme. The vilest of them is missing an eye, but he makes sure to keep his remaining one fixed on you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Yamaçtan inen yerliler, son derece düşmancıl görünüyor. En iğrenç olanlarının bir gözü eksik ancak kalan gözünü senden ayırmamak için ciddi bir özen gösteriyor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les autochtones qui descendent ont tous l'air particulièrement hostiles. Le plus immonde du lot semble avoir perdu un œil, ce qui ne l'empêche pas de vous fixer de celui qu'il lui reste.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The local inhabitants coming down the slope look hostile in the extreme. The vilest of them is missing an eye, but he makes sure to keep his remaining one fixed on you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les autochtones qui descendent ont tous l'air particulièrement hostiles. Le plus immonde du lot semble avoir perdu un œil, ce qui ne l'empêche pas de vous fixer de celui qu'il lui reste.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die hiesigen Einwohner, die das Gefälle herunterkommen, sehen extrem feindselig aus. Dem Abstoßendsten von ihnen fehlt ein Auge, aber er ist darauf bedacht, dich mit seinem verbliebenen zu fixieren.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The local inhabitants coming down the slope look hostile in the extreme. The vilest of them is missing an eye, but he makes sure to keep his remaining one fixed on you.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die hiesigen Einwohner, die das Gefälle herunterkommen, sehen extrem feindselig aus. Dem Abstoßendsten von ihnen fehlt ein Auge, aber er ist darauf bedacht, dich mit seinem verbliebenen zu fixieren.{/n}
